subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: PHILADELPHIA, July 9 (AP) — Magnetic resonance imaging scans and X-rays tell the story of the Philadelphia Phillies’ struggles during the first half of the season better than poor pitching and inconsistent hitting.
snippet: PHILADELPHIA, July 9 (AP) — Magnetic resonance imaging scans and X-rays tell the story of the Philadelphia Phillies’ struggles during the first half of the season better than poor pitching and inconsistent hitting.
